abstract: Marek Čech (born 26 January 1983) is a Slovak professional footballer who plays for Bologna. He primarily plays as an attacking left-sided wing-back.
comment: Marek Čech (born 26 January 1983) is a Slovak professional footballer who plays for Bologna. He primarily plays as an attacking left-sided wing-back.
